text:
"They’re treating the Michael Flynn story like it's a bigger deal than the deaths of 2,000 Americans a day."

@brianstelter rips "right-wing media" for extensive coverage of @GenFlynn and the Russia investigation. https://t.co/I2fNW4whGY
